front.title: Private Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)extension for Associated Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI)

abstract.t: This memo describes a private extension to SIP [1] that allows a registrar to return a set of associated URIs to a registered address- of-record. We define the P-Associated-URI header field, used in the 200 OK response to a REGISTER request. The P-Associated-URI header field transports the set of Associated URIs to the registered address- of-record.
